name: Annihilation
description:
Annihilation


Annihilation is a turn based strategy game taking place in deep space. Goal of every encounter is to destroy enemy planet and try to save your own from destruction. This game is strongly inspired by the pen & paper game Battleships.

Build


Build various units in strategic places and hope that the enemy doesnt guess where you've placed them. You don't see the enemy's planet and he doesn't see yours.
Repair your units when they take damage and don't get completely destroyed.

Attack


Choose wich region you want to attack and send the atom bombs to do the job. If you're lucky, you'll hit the enemy's HQ which will end in you wining the game.
Build an R&D facility to upgrade your rockets or defense systems. Inflict more damage and widen the range of explosion causing closeby units to take damage as well.

Defend


Place energy pillars to create a forcefield giving you additional protection against enemy rockets. Develop a satelite defense systems that will have chance to shoot down enemy rockets while they are still in the air.
